name: Turkey Rampage 3000
description:
Story:

You are Torkey, a turkey that has gained the ability to use a gun. Now, you must get revenge on the pilgrims for killing and eating your turkey brethren. Beware of wolves, there is no way to kill them! If you manage to get past all of the evil pilgrims, you'll be reunited with your turkey girlfriend, so get to shootin'! 

Controls: 

A = Left

D = Right

Space = Jump (can double jump)

Q =Gobble!

Left-click = shoot

Credits: 

Katie Pearson: Producer, Creative Director, Lead Artist, Character Artist, Environment Artist, UI-Designer

Storm Kaffenberger: Scrum Master, Producer, Gameplay Engineer, Audio Engineer, UI- Designer, Sound Designer

Tyler Katz = Environment Artist 

Chris Lenhart = Environment Artist 

Ross Woods = Level Designer 

Michael Diperi = Environment Artist
